name: AccountsByIndustryChart
title: Accounts by Industry Chart
description: Interactive pie chart component that visualizes account distribution by industry with click-to-filter functionality.
functionalRequirements:
## Pie Chart Component

- Display interactive pie chart using Chart.js
- Show industry names with counts in legend
- Calculate and display percentages in tooltips
- Support click-to-select functionality
- Animate on hover with visual feedback
- Configurable color schemes
- Handle 'Others' grouping for small segments
technicalDesign:
## Technical Design

### Props
- industryData: Grouped and calculated industry data
- selectedIndustry: Currently selected slice
- onSliceClick: Callback for slice selection
- colorScheme: Color palette selection
- maxIndustries: Maximum slices to show

### Implementation
- Uses Chart.js for rendering
- Ref-based chart instance management
- Cleanup on unmount to prevent memory leaks

properties.name: industryData
properties.description: Object containing labels, data, percentages, and total count

properties.name: onSliceClick
properties.description: Callback function when a slice is clicked

properties.name: colorScheme
properties.description: Color palette: default, vibrant, or pastel
